sub_title: Drilling Supervisor / Senior Well Site Leader
summary:
Strong well operations skills.
I have a proven track record working as a Senior Well Site leader (Senior Drilling Supervisor) both in Azerbaijan on the ACG platforms & Floater and in Algeria working on land rigs.
My current role as Onshore Senior Well Site Leader allows me to work on the ACG platforms to cover for Well Site Leaders when required. I’m also an approved as Wells Superintendent for vacation relief and spend about 50% of my time working in this role. When I’m not working in one of the previously mentioned roles, I‘ve been involved with investigations and the review of well operations procedures.
In my early career I’ve worked as a drilling engineer and therefore have a good understanding of well planning.
I’ve been involved as an operations representative in the construction of East Azeri and West Chirag platforms, which gave me good insight into rig building.
